content:
Hi,
I'm writing my master's thesis about profile development in FHIR. In this context, I would like to develop a profile for depression. Therefore, it would be interesting for me if there are already works, e. g. resources or profiles, in the area of mental illnesses. So far, I have not found anything through my own research. Is anyone aware of any work?
Thanks in advance!

Hi Anne!
Here in the Netherlands I think that would fall into https://zibs.nl/wiki/Problem-v4.4(2020EN) or https://zibs.nl/wiki/FunctionalOrMentalStatus-v3.2(2020EN). Published profiles for these information models can be found here: https://simplifier.net/nictizstu3-zib2017
